TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowChrome extends System.Windows.Freezable

summary.span: 表示描述窗口的非客户端区域的自定义项的对象。

span.span: Represents an object that describes the customizations to the non-client area of a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使你能够将 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 内容扩展到通常为操作系统的窗口管理器保留一个窗口非工作区。The class enables you to extend Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content into the non-client area of a window that is typically reserved for the operating system’s window manager. ## 标准 WindowsStandard Windows 标准 windows 由两个重叠的矩形构成。Standard windows are composed of two overlapping rectangles. 外部矩形*非工作区*，这通常称为*chrome*。The outer rectangle is the *non-client area*, which is often referred to as *chrome*. 它的绘制和操作系统的窗口管理器管理。It is drawn and managed by the operating system’s window manager. 其维度取决于标准操作系统设置。Its dimensions are determined by standard operating system settings. 非客户端框架提供了标准的窗口功能和行为。The non-client frame provides standard window features and behaviors. 其中包括标题按钮 （最小化、 最大化，并关闭），窗口边框，调整大小和移动行为、 应用程序图标和标题和系统菜单。These include caption buttons (Minimize, Maximize, and Close), the window border, resize and move behaviors, the application icon and title, and the system menu. 内部矩形*工作区*。The inner rectangle is the *client area*. 它包含应用程序的内容和它的绘制和管理应用程序。It contains the contents of your application, and it is drawn and managed by the application. 有关 WPF 应用程序中的 windows 的详细信息，请参阅[WPF Windows 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-windows-overview.md)。For more information about windows in WPF applications, see [WPF Windows Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-windows-overview.md). 下图显示了标准的窗口的各个部分。The following illustration shows the parts of a standard window. ![窗口元素](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "窗口元素")![Window elements](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "Window elements") ## 自定义 WindowsCustom Windows 可以通过设置自定义窗口边框属性设置为或使用类。You can customize a window border by setting the property to or by using the class. ### WindowStyle.NoneWindowStyle.None 自定义 WPF 应用程序窗口的外观的一种方法是设置属性设置为。One way to customize the appearance of a WPF application window is to set the property to . 这从窗口中删除非客户端框架，并使仅客户端区域中，可以将自定义样式应用到其中。This removes the non-client frame from the window and leaves only the client area, to which you can apply a custom style. 但是，当删除非客户端框架时，您还丢失了系统功能和行为，它提供了标题按钮和重设窗口大小等。However, when the non-client frame is removed, you also lose the system features and behaviors that it provides, such as caption buttons and window resizing. 另一个副作用是最大化窗口，将介绍 Windows 任务栏。Another side effect is that the window will cover the Windows taskbar when it is maximized. 设置，可创建完全自定义应用程序，但还需要在应用程序来模拟标准窗口行为中实现自定义逻辑。Setting enables you to create a completely custom application, but also requires that you implement custom logic in your application to emulate standard window behavior. ### WindowChromeWindowChrome 若要自定义窗口，同时保留其标准功能，可以使用类。To customize a window while retaining its standard functionality, you can use the class. 类将窗口框架的功能分隔开来从视觉对象，并允许您控制的客户端和应用程序窗口的非工作区之间的边界。The class separates the functionality of the window frame from the visuals, and lets you control the boundary between the client and non-client areas of your application window. 类，可以将 WPF 通过扩展客户端区域以覆盖非客户端区域窗口框架中的内容。The class lets you put WPF content in the window frame by extending the client area to cover the non-client area. 同时，它将保留两个不可见区域; 通过系统行为*调整大小边框*并*标题*区域。At the same time, it retains system behaviors through two invisible areas; the *resize border* and *caption* areas. 有两个主要部件创建自定义窗口使用类。There are two main parts to creating a custom window using the class. 首先，您在窗口的非客户端部分通过设置自定义属性上公开对象。First, you customize the non-client part of the window by setting properties exposed on the object. 然后窗口，用于定义扩展到非工作区应用程序的一部分提供的模板。在公开的属性对象是否， ， ，和。Then you provide a template for the window that defines the part of your application that is extended into the non-client area.The properties exposed on the object are , , , and . 属性指定的用户可以单击并拖动以调整窗口的大小的应用程序窗口外部不可见边框。The property specifies an invisible border around the outside of the application window that the user can click-and-drag to resize the window. 属性指定不可见区域，使系统行为通常与标题栏的窗口的顶部。The property specifies an invisible area at the top of the window that enables system behaviors typically associated with the title bar. 这些行为包括： 单击并拖动鼠标来移动窗口，双击以最大化窗口，然后右键单击以显示系统菜单。These behaviors include: click and drag to move the window, double-click to maximize the window, and right-click to show the system menu. 大小调整边框和标题区域并没有任何可视元素;它们仅定义输入和启用系统提供的标准窗口行为做出响应的区域。The resize border and caption area do not have any visual elements; they only define areas that respond to input and enable standard system-provided window behaviors. 属性指定窗口的角变圆的量。The property specifies the amount that the corners of the window are rounded. 此属性没有任何影响，如果对窗口启用玻璃框。This property does not have any effect if the glass frame is enabled for a window. 属性指定的窗口周围玻璃框的宽度。The property specifies the width of the glass frame around the window. 默认情况下，它使用指定的系统值属性来模拟标准窗口的外观。By default, it uses the system value specified by the property to emulate the appearance of a standard window. 当使用玻璃框时，最小化、 最大化，并关闭的标题按钮是可见和交互式的。When the glass frame is used, the caption buttons for Minimize, Maximize, and Close are visible and interactive. 应用程序负责显示应用程序图标和标题文本。The application is responsible for displaying the application icon and caption text. 可以设置属性以使更宽或窄而不是默认的玻璃框。You can set the property to make the glass frame wider or narrower than the default. > [!CAUTION] > 标题按钮的大小不会更改时属性更改。The size of the caption buttons does not change when the property is changed. 如果顶部的玻璃框的高度小于标题按钮的高度，在标题按钮不会完全可见。If the height of the top of the glass frame is less than the height of the caption buttons, the caption buttons will not be completely visible. 若要使不具有玻璃框自定义窗口，请设置属性设置为统一值为 0。To make a custom window that does not have a glass frame, set the property to a uniform value of 0. 这将禁用并隐藏在标准标题按钮。This will disable and hide the standard caption buttons. 若要扩展玻璃框，以覆盖整个窗口，设置属性设置为负值在任意一侧。To extend the glass frame to cover the entire window, set the property to a negative value on any side. 当属性设置为负值的任意一侧，其强制转换后的值将等于。When the property is set to a negative value for any side, its coerced value will be equal to . > [!NOTE] > Aero 是一系列 visual 查找范围的增强功能以及在 Windows Vista 中引入的 Windows 桌面的功能。Aero is a set of visual enhancements to the look and functionality of the Windows desktop that was introduced in Windows Vista. Aero 的更直观的功能之一是透明的玻璃窗口边框。One of the more visually obvious features of Aero is translucent glass window borders. Windows Aero 桌面组合功能的桌面窗口管理器 (DWM) 启用。Windows Aero is enabled by the desktop composition feature of the Desktop Window Manager (DWM). Windows Aero 玻璃效果不支持在所有操作系统上，可禁用受支持操作系统上。Windows Aero glass effects are not supported on all operating systems, and can be disabled on supported operating systems. 如果 Windows Aero 不可用，玻璃框将不显示而不考虑属性值。If Windows Aero is not available, the glass frame will not be displayed regardless of the property value. 此属性指定的边框区域将显示为黑色。检查属性以验证 Windows Aero 玻璃效果是否可用。The border area specified by this property will appear black instead.Check the property to verify that Windows Aero glass effects are available. 如果玻璃效果不可用，则应提供未使用的玻璃框或使用标准的窗口的窗口样式设置为 null 的备用的窗口样式。If glass effects are not available, you should provide an alternate window style that does not use the glass frame or use the standard window by setting the window style to null. 通过指定定义的外观和行为的框架内容的 ControlTemplate 可将你的 WPF 内容扩展到窗口框架中。You extend your WPF content into the window frame by specifying a ControlTemplate that defines the appearance and behavior of the frame content. 将的 ControlTemplate TargetType 设置为要自定义窗口的类型。You set the TargetType of the ControlTemplate to the type of the window that you are customizing. ```xaml ``` 默认情况下，在窗口的非客户端区域内任何可视元素的部分都不是交互式的。By default, the parts of any visual elements that are within the non-client area of the window are not interactive. 若要启用非工作区中的交互式元素，将附加的 WindowsChrome.IsHitTestVisibleInChrome 属性附加到元素，并将其设置为 true。To enable interactive elements in the non-client area, attach the WindowsChrome.IsHitTestVisibleInChrome attached property to the element and set it to true. 下面的 XAML 标记显示自定义使用 WindowChrome 类窗口所需的主要元素。The following XAML markup shows the main elements needed to customize a window using the WindowChrome class. ```xaml ``` 第一个 setter 将 WindowChrome 附加到窗口。The first setter attaches the WindowChrome to the window. 它使用所有默认值为 WindowChrome 属性，因此看起来像标准窗口的窗口。It uses all default values for the WindowChrome properties, which makes the window look like a standard window. ```xaml ``` 窗口模板必须指定内容表示器显示你的应用程序中指定的窗口的内容。The window template must specify a content presenter to display the contents of the window specified in your application. 默认情况下 WindowChrome 类用于扩展客户端区域以覆盖非客户端边框。By default the WindowChrome class extends the client area to cover the non-client border. 若要发现的玻璃框，您需要指定 ContentPresenter 周围的边距。In order to uncover the glass frame, you need to specify a margin around the ContentPresenter. 此标记指定边框与周围内容表示器来模拟标准窗口的外观的白色背景。This markup specifies a border with a white background around the content presenter to emulate the appearance of a standard window. 它还指定绑定到 WindowNonClientFrameThickness 属性，用于获取默认系统宽度的框的边距。It also specifies a margin that is bound to the WindowNonClientFrameThickness property, which gets the default system width for the frame. ```xaml ``` 由 WindowChrome 类; 不显示的应用程序图标和标题他们必须添加到作为自定义内容的边框。The application icon and title are not displayed by the WindowChrome class; they have to be added to the border as custom content. 以下 XAML 添加图像和一个 textblock 来显示图标和标题。The following XAML adds an image and a textblock to display the icon and title. 这两个元素绑定到相应的属性窗口上。Both elements are bound to the corresponding properties on the window. 图像宽度绑定到 SmallIconSize 宽度，图标获取默认的系统大小。The image width is bound to the SmallIconSize width, which gets the default system size for the icon. IsHitTestVisibleInChrome 附加属性设置在图像上，以便它可以接收鼠标事件。The IsHitTestVisibleInChrome attached property is set on the image so that it can receive mouse events. ```xaml ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double CaptionHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.CaptionHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置窗口顶部标题区域的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the caption area at the top of a window.
The height of the caption area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性来指定使系统行为通常与标题栏的窗口顶部的区域。Set the property to specify the area at the top of the window that enables the system behaviors typically associated with the title bar. 这些行为包括双击以最大化窗口中，右键单击要打开系统菜单，并单击和拖动来移动窗口。These behaviors include double-click to maximize the window, right-click to open the system menu, and click-and-drag to move the window. 此属性可以设置为任何非负的双精度值。This property can be set to any non-negative double value. 由定义的区域属性开始前的大小调整边框的下边缘，并向下扩展指定的量。The area defined by the property starts at the bottom edge of the top resize border and extends downward the specified amount. 该视图所跨越在右侧窗口的宽度和左大小调整边框。It spans the width of the window inside the right and left resize borders. 此区域不具有任何与其; 关联的可视元素仅可用于定义标题栏行为做出响应的区域。This area does not have any visual elements associated with it; it is only used to define the region that responds to the title bar behaviors. 默认情况下，在窗口的标题区域内任何可视元素的部分都不是交互式的。By default, the parts of any visual elements that are within the caption area of the window are not interactive. 若要启用标题区域中的交互式元素，将附加附加属性设置为元素并将其设置为`true`。To enable interactive elements in the caption area, attach the attached property to the element and set it to `true`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::CornerRadius CornerRadius { System::Windows::CornerRadius get(); void set(System::Windows::CornerRadius value); };
member this.CornerRadius : System.Windows.CornerRadius with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示圆形窗口边角的度数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the amount that the corners of a window are rounded.

value.span: 一个描述倒圆的量的值。

span.span: A value that describes the amount that corners are rounded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性指定的窗口的边角处舍入。Set the property to specify the amount of rounding at the corners of a window. 此属性可以设置为任何非负的双精度值。This property can be set to any non-negative double value. 值可以是非一致性。The values can be non-uniform. 最大化的窗口或具有 Windows Aero 玻璃框的 windows，则此属性不会影响。This property does not affect maximized windows or windows that have a Windows Aero glass frame. 它未启用 Windows Aero （也称为桌面窗口管理器） 时才有意义或属性设置为 0。It only has an effect when Windows Aero (also called Desktop Window Manager) is not enabled or the property is set to 0. 在非工作区中的命中测试不采用考虑确定鼠标是否重设大小边界上时。Hit testing in the non-client area does not take the into account when determining whether the mouse is over a resize border. 如果 radius 相对于太大则有可能用户无法执行使用鼠标对角线的大小调整。If the radius is too large relative to the then it is possible that the user cannot perform a diagonal resize using the mouse. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GlassFrameCompleteThickness As Thickness
public: static property System::Windows::Thickness GlassFrameCompleteThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); };

summary.span: 获取统一的粗细为 -1。

span.span: Gets a uniform thickness of -1.

value.span: 在所有情况下，统一宽度值为 -1。

span.span: A uniform thickness of -1 in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为实用程序，使您能够将玻璃框架的粗细设置为命名的属性提供属性。The property is provided as a utility to enable you to set the thickness of the glass frame to a named property. 您设置属性等于以将玻璃框扩展到整个窗口。You set the property equal to to extend the glass frame over the entire window. 如果属性设置为负值的任意一侧，其强制转换后的值将等于。If the property is set to a negative value for any side, its coerced value will be equal to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness GlassFrameThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.GlassFrameThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示窗口周围透明边框的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the width of the glass border around a window.

value.span: 窗口周围玻璃边框的宽度。

span.span: The width of the glass border around a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性来指定 Windows Aero 玻璃框扩展到窗口的客户端区域的金额。Set the property to specify the amount that the Windows Aero glass frame extends into the client area of a window. 默认情况下，玻璃框将使用系统值来模拟标准窗口的外观。By default, the glass frame will use system values to emulate the look of a standard window. 如果启用了 Windows Aero，然后在标准标题按钮 （最大化、 最小化，关闭） 是已启用和交互式的。If Windows Aero is enabled, then the standard caption buttons (Maximize, Minimize, Close) are enabled and interactive. 若要使不具有玻璃框的自定义窗口，请将此粗细设置为统一值为 0。To make a custom window that does not have a glass frame, set this thickness to a uniform value of 0. 这将禁用标准标题按钮。This will disable the standard caption buttons. 若要扩展玻璃框，以覆盖整个窗口，设置属性设置为负值在任意一侧。To extend the glass frame to cover the entire window, set the property to a negative value on any side. 如果属性设置为负值的任意一侧，其强制转换后的值将等于。If the property is set to a negative value for any side, its coerced value will be equal to . 作为实用程序，使您能够将玻璃框架的粗细设置为将玻璃效果扩展的整个范围内的已命名属性提供属性。The property is provided as a utility to enable you to set the thickness of the glass frame to a named property that extends the glass over the entire window. Windows Aero 玻璃效果不支持在所有操作系统上，可禁用受支持操作系统上。Windows Aero glass effects are not supported on all operating systems, and can be disabled on supported operating systems. 如果 Windows Aero 不可用，玻璃框将不显示而不考虑属性值。If Windows Aero is not available, the glass frame will not be displayed regardless of the property value. 应检查属性以验证 Windows Aero 玻璃效果是否可用。You should check the property to verify that Windows Aero glass effects are available. 如果玻璃效果不可用，则应提供不使用玻璃框的备用的窗口样式。If glass effects are not available, you should provide an alternate window style that does not use the glass frame. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Shell::NonClientFrameEdges NonClientFrameEdges { System::Windows::Shell::NonClientFrameEdges get(); void set(System::Windows::Shell::NonClientFrameEdges value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示窗口框架边缘是否归客户端所有。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates which edges of the window frame are not owned by the client.

value.span: 枚举值的按位组合，这些值指定客户端不能拥有的帧的边缘。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify which edges of the frame are not owned by the client.
The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness ResizeBorderThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.ResizeBorderThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示边框的宽度，用于调整窗口大小尺寸。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the width of the border that is used to resize a window.

value.span: 用于调整窗口的边框宽度。

span.span: The width of the border that is used to resize a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性来指定在其中用户可以单击并拖动以调整窗口大小的区域的宽度。Set the property to specify the width of the area where a user can click-and-drag to resize a window. 鼠标指针将改为大小调整箭头时移到的大小调整边框上。The mouse pointer changes to resize arrows when it is moved over the resize border. 此属性可以设置为任何非负的双精度值。This property can be set to any non-negative double value. 值可以是非一致性。The values can be non-uniform. 默认情况下，调整大小边框将使用系统值来模拟标准窗口的行为。By default, the resize border will use system values to emulate the behavior of a standard window. 此区域仅用于定义用于调整窗口; 的大小的区域它没有任何与之关联的可视元素。This area is only used to define the region that is used to resize the window; it does not have any visual elements associated with it. 但是，它确实会影响布局的大小调整边框内的元素。However, it does affect the layout of elements inside the resize border. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，表示是对 Windows Aero 标题按钮启用的命中测试是否可用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether hit-testing is enabled on the Windows Aero caption buttons.

value.span: 如果在标题按钮上启用命中测试，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if hit-testing is enabled on the caption buttons; otherwise, .
The registered default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 Windows Aero 标题按钮是关闭、 最大化/还原和最小化。The default Windows Aero caption buttons are Close, Maximize/Restore, and Minimize. 如果不使用 Windows Aero 标题按钮，则应提供一种替代方法来完成这些任务的用户。If you do not use the Windows Aero captions buttons, you should provide an alternative method for a user to accomplish these tasks. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
